alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 10 at 8:36PM PDT until June 11 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT SATURDAY... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Waves 2 to 3 feet on Pyramid Lake. For the Heat Advisory, high temperatures Saturday between 95 and 100 degrees expected. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake and Lahontan Reservoir. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, from noon to 10 PM PDT Saturday. For the Heat Advisory, from noon to 8 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. Drink plenty of fluids, and include frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening, and check up on elderly or heat-sensitive relatives and neighbors.
